channel.title: You must wait 10 seconds before you log out?
channel.description:
Ok, most server sources come with this code but mine doesn't :(
does anybody know how i can set this ?

item.title: You must wait 10 seconds before you log out?
item.dc:creator: @godtrix godtrix
item.description:
@godtrix wrote:

tyvm lol i did have it but was set to 1 second -.- lol

item.title: You must wait 10 seconds before you log out?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Wow, I have this code,

Okay, this tutorial will stop people from logging out, either attacking npc’s or attacking players. It will still stop people from logging out, if they are attacking something, but they are not getting attacked themselves.

In client.java search:

public void entangle()

Above that add:

public void inCombat() { LogoutDelay = 30; }

You can change the logout delay to how you want it, 30 is about 20 seconds, which I feel is the best time.

Then search:

public int EntangleDelay = 0;

Above that, add this:

public int LogoutDelay = 0;

After you have added that int, search:

if(EntangleDelay > 0) EntangleDelay -= 1;

Above that, add this:

if(LogoutDelay > 0) LogoutDelay -= 1;

Now go to your logout packet ( case 9154: ), and replace it with this:

case 9154: //Log out { if ((absX >= 0000 && absX <= 0000 && absY >=0000 && absY <=0000 ) || (absX >= 0000 && absX <= 0000 && absY >=0000 && absY <=0000)) { sendMessage("Logout has been disabled for this area."); } else { if (LogoutDelay >= 1) { sendMessage("You must wait 20 seconds after combat to log out!"); } else if (LogoutDelay == 0) { logout(); savefile = true; } } } break;

Replace the coords of the area, where you want logout to be disabled for, I have a jail, so I put the coords of my jail, so they cannot logout.

Good luck with your servers.

Musicmad

Read full topic
